description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nHere to Die:
After an enemy is afflicted with either {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLEED} or {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_POISON}, this creature afflicts them with whichever of these debuffs the target doesn't already have.
name: Canopy Mandible
